text: Thæcring rea hen bıhna khxng cea hængn pi nı fak fa bxy khrang nænxn rea hı cea phin pi yang this thi cea phungcı dangnan cea cng phin bıhna khxng cea pi tha ngmasyidil ha rxm theid læa thi dı ktam thi phwk cea prakt xyu k cng phin bıhna khxng phwk cea pi thang this nan læa thæcring brrda phu thi di rab khamphir nan yxm ru di wa man khux khwam cring thima cak phracea khxng phwk khea læa xallxhˌ nan mi thrng phelx nı sing thi phwk khea kratha kan
